*the pod starts scanning for lifeforms... It finds an eagle and a lion*

*Rexon pants as he runs towards the pod, keeping the direction it set in his sight. He was going to reach it.. soon, maybe in a few minutes (can't remember the BW word for it!). The Wolf in him helped kept him running, but the Fox was not adapted for running such a distance. His toungue was lolling out*

*Finally he reaches the pod, and sees the DNA scanner just go down. He goes to Robot Mode, his first time, and waits for the new Protoform to come out*
